name: MLMultiArrayConstraint
desc: The shape and data type constraints for a multidimensional array feature.

items.name: var shape: [NSNumber]
items.desc: The shape of the multi array.

items.name: var dataType: MLMultiArrayDataType
items.desc: The type for the multi array.

items.name: var shapeConstraint: MLMultiArrayShapeConstraint
items.desc: The constraint on the shape of the multiarray.

items.name: class MLMultiArrayShapeConstraint
items.desc: The lists of shapes or ranges of shapes that constrain a multiarray feature.
